1.content: You are a normal (non-anthro) pokemon but what are you?
1.title: What pokemon?

113.content:
Resting against a tree trunk, watching the forest around you, it's mildly entertaining, but still not what you like. You long for action, battles, becoming the strongest pokemon ever! That was the life you want. You wish that one day a trainer would come up and catch you in a pokeball, then train you and go on adventures. You often fantasize about taking on the pokemon league and becoming a champion, meeting the hundreds of kinds of pokemon from all over the world, a life of adventure, a life of things that were never the same...

Of course, that was just a dream, no trainer would ever catch you. No humans never came to this forest in fear of the large amounts of predator pokemon who wouldn't think twice before eating a human. You sigh and sit up, somehow you feel today will be a day of adventure.
113.title: Raichu!

choices: One of the preds form the forest spots you.
You see a pachirisu being eaten by an arbok.
You make it to a pecha berry bush without anything unusual happening.
12.content:
It was dawn as you emerged from your den, well rested and ready to start your day. You lived in a small cave underwater that had an air pocket, it was pretty roomy, and the grass that you had formed a nest out of made it comfortable too. Nobody else knew about your little cave, so it was your safe haven for hiding for any preds that you would meet. But right now you were hungry, so you couldn't keep hiding here and had to go to the forest to stock up on berries again.

You dived into the water towards the exit to the cave, the coldness of the water perking you up quite a bit, you bent your body and used your two tails to propel yourself forward, then broke through the thick coat of algae that served as a door to keep your home well hidden, then you inflated the sack on your neck with the air you had stored in your mouth and floated to the surface. You jumped out of the cold water onto the shore of the lake, then shook the water out of your fur and continued on into the forest.
12.title: Buizel.

121.content:
A tropius walked through the forest lazily, it didn't have anything it wanted to do in particular, and it wanted something to cure it from its boredom. It sat down under one of the tallest trees and looked around, watching other pokemon going about their business, a buneary in the bushes, a rattata scurrying around collecting nuts, nothing happening now was particularly interesting. A quick movement from the corner of its eye caused it to turn its head, and there it saw a buizel running across the forest floor.

"Not a usual species around here," the tropuis said to itself, "This may be worth my while."

The tropius got up, and followed the buizel that it saw in the distance.
121.title: One of the preds form the forest spots you.

choices: Tropius decides that theres buizel on the menu today.
Tropius is just curious why a buizel is in the forest.
1212.content: You walk over to the pecha berry bush that you always eat from. You pick up a berry and take a huge bite out of it, savoring its taste. Suddenly you feel something wrap around one of your tails and drag you upwards, you twist yourself around to see what it was, and see a long green vine dragging you back. You try to stand, but the vine pulls you up and brings you to eye level with your captor - a tropius!
1212.title: Tropius caught a wild buizel!

choices: The dragonair attacks her by pulling her under and eating her
He grabs her tail with his mouth and toys with her.
the only sister that she loves finds her but is attcked and eaten before her eye
He lets her be and looks for another meal
13.content:
A young vulpix sneaks out of a burrow at night. She cant stand living her with her other six siblings. She is always picked on by all six of them just because she is the youngest and the runt of the group. She quickly ran into the forest. Her first stop was by a lake where she would swim by her self to get away from her other brothers and sisters.
This is her secret swimming hole and non of the others know about it.

She swims to the middle witch is her favorite spot and floats on the water letting her pain and suffering slowly flow out of her. She was completely unaware of the dragonair eyeing her hungry, waiting to strike
13.title: Vulpix family

choices: The feraligatr continues enjoying its prey.
133.content:
The vulpix didn't realize what happened as a huge pair of jaws suddenly engulfed her and snapped shut. She was stunned for a few seconds but as soon as she felt muscles pulling her backwards she panicked and tried to run forwards, but the throat had a hold on one of her tails and was quickly sucking her in, with the tongue pushing her face back too. She desperately tried to breathe fire on the tongue, but it seemed to have no effect, so all she could do was squirm and struggle as the tight confines of the throat sucked her deeper into the predator.

--x--x--x--

The dragonair haddecided that the vulpix would be a delicious morsel to have as a snack, so he started so circle around her in the water, darting around in the shadows, waiting to strike. The prey was unsuspecting, and would be an easy meal. He came up behind her, and turned his direction towards her, locked on to his target, jaws open, nothing could stop him now...

SNAP!

...except that.

The dragonair veered off his course in surprise as a huge feraligatr swam up and caught the vulpix in its jaws in an instant. The dragonair swam a safe distance away from the huge pred as he saw a bulge begin to form on the feraligatr's neck.
133.title: Something else attacks first.

choices: The feraligatr walks home to its den while being followed by dragonair.
1331.content:
The vulpix squealed and struggled as the tight and wet throat sucked her in deeper and deeper. It was up around her stomach now and she could feel the rippling throat muscles at her hindpaws, pulling her further in. She began to be pushed down faster, and felt more of her fur getting sticky and wet with saliva. She felt a movement as the predator eating her lifted up its head. Soon only her face and muzzle was still in the mouth, she was panicking even more now now, she looked out at the says of sunlight through the massive and sharp teeth, the last of daylight she would see.

Now, all she saw was pink as her whole body was squeezed in the tight confines of a throat. She desperately tried to scratch the sides, do something to end this, but nothing was working. She felt a finger pressing on her from the outside, and a muffled voice that sounded like "Mmmurrrrrr" This sent her into another fit of wriggling and trying to twist her body around.

After what seemed like an eternity, she passed through a ring of muscle and felt most of the tightness disappear. She realized that she was being deposited into the beast's stomach. She felt her whole body being sucked into the wet sack and kicked and squirmed as much as she could. As soon as her head was out she begin to writhe around and wriggle at full force, trying to get whoever ate her to spit her out. She soon became exhausted, and stopped her attacks, laying down. She felt the stomach move all around constantly, the walls contracting. She got up again, ready for another attack.

--x--x--x--

The dragonair watched enviously while the feraligatr swallowed its prey down, tracing the wriggling bulge down its throat with its finger, and murring all the while. The dragonair's eyes narrowed.

"That was supposed to be MY vulpix," He thought angrily, "That feraligatr has no right to take whats mine!"

The dragonair's eyes followed the bulge the vulpix made down the feraligatr, where it dissapeared in the chest are and reappeared on the belly. The feraligatr smiled and rubbed its belly a bit, then it casually swam out of the pond, and walked into the forest surrounding it. Little did it know that it was being followed.
1331.title: The feraligatr continues enjoying its prey.

13313.content:
The large feraligatr stomped through the forest, quite oblivious to everything around himself. He had no idea that another pokemon was moving through the underbrush behind him, plotting an attack. He smiled to himself, quite pleased with himself for catching a nice midnight snack, and stalked into a nearby cave. He looked around, noticing that nothing had been disturbed in the time he was gone, and settled down on a sleeping bag that he had stolen from a newbie trainer that had screamed and ran at the first sight of him. He closed his eyes and tried to sleep, but he couldn't seem to when there was another pokemon inside him, he just decided to enjoy the feeling of the wriggling in his stomach before the vulpix tired itself out and fell asleep.

--x--x--x--

The dragonair snaked through the grass, being sure to not let the feraligatr out of its sight. He moved to the side of the dirt path and slithered up a tree, coiling around one of the branches. He watched as the feraligatr changed course and settled down in a cave directly across from the tree. Dragonair quickly moved down from the tree and kept low as he moved towards a bush at the front of the cave and settled there. It closed its eyes and thought of ways it would get revenge in the morning when it could see, and at the same time trying to get itself to fall asleep.

--x--x--x--

The vulpix desperately tried to bite and claw at the stomach around her, only to see that the walls absorbed all her attacks. She angrily bashed her head against it, breathed fire on it, nothing worked. She was beginning to wear out, and she tried one last attack, a flamethrower, but the fire only illuminated the squishy pink stomach for a second before going out from the hot humidness of the water type's stomach. She slumped over, and whimpered a little.

She knew she was going to die in there, or at least thought, as she felt no liquids enter the chamber she was is, felt no burning sensation around her, heard no gurgling and grumbling sounds that a stomach usually makes when digesting its contents. She just heard the muffled sounds of the outside world, and the beating heart of her captor. She closed her eyes, exhausted from what happened that night, and quickly fell asleep.
13313.title: The feraligatr walks home to its den.

choices: Feraligatr is attacked by one angry ninetails.
Dragonair awakens in the middle of the night and sees ninetails.
133132.content:
Pitch black, one-a-clock, and a ninetails roamed the forest. She had awoken to find one of her kits missing, and had gone off to find her. She blew out a small puff of fire to illuminate the area around her, finding small dusty footprints that had been sure of where they were going. Her tails flicked once as she was off onto the trail, dashing as fast as she could to follow her daughter. She jumped into the bushes where the footprints stopped and encountered a small pond. The paw prints led in, none led out. She walked around the pond, inspecting it to see if someone was in there. She blew out more fire so she could find her way, and then noticed something on the other side of the lake. More footprints, but these were larger, and still fresh.

Then ninetails was off again, following her daughter's captor.
133132.title: Later that night...

info.brief_description: You are a prey pokemon and have to survive daily pred activity
info.description:
There are 3 kinds of Pokemon: pred, prey, and both. You are a prey pokemon and have to survive against the other two kinds of pokemon. Will you make it uneaten


Oral vore only
Keep it 13+
Digestion is not required and is not encouraged
